name: PolicyFly
headline: Modernizing Specialty Insurance
description:
PolicyFly empowers insurers to sell and manage specialty insurance in minutes instead of in weeks.

Every year, $200B of specialty insurance like Cyber, Flood or Trucking is processed over email between agents and insurers – PolicyFly connects both parties to automate these workflows and to consolidate all data. 

We bring growth, efficiency and transparency to otherwise hard to insure markets.

founders.name: Cory Crosland, Founder
founders.description:
CEO of PolicyFly

Previously started a digital product studio, Croscon. After the 4th insurance company asked us to build the same custom platform, we realized we needed to create it as a product and thus PolicyFly was born…

founders.name: Marcel Esser, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ PolicyFly. Judoka and jiujiteiro. Lover of coffee. Gearhead with gasoline in his veins. Soul saved by rock & roll.

founders.name: Michael Fiedel, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of PolicyFly and COO. I also Co-Founded InsurTech Ohio and Scout InsurTech, which allows me to better understand the ongoing evolution of insurance and the people pushing innovation in an industry I've come to love.

generated_description:
**PolicyFly: Modernizing Specialty Insurance**

Founded in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W22, PolicyFly is on a mission to revolutionize the specialty insurance space. Based in New York, the team of 15 is tackling a massive inefficiency in the industry that sees around $200 billion of specialty insurance—including critical areas like Cyber, Flood, and Trucking—processed via clunky email communications between agents and insurers.

So, what does PolicyFly do? Simply put, they empower insurers to sell and manage specialty insurance in minutes, not weeks. By connecting agents and insurers, they automate workflows and consolidate data, introducing much-needed growth, efficiency, and transparency to markets that are often deemed hard to insure.

**Key Features:**
- **Automated Submissions:** Using smart forms and fields, PolicyFly enables agents to handle submissions swiftly and seamlessly—imagine an application process that feels 'magical'.
- **Data-Driven Underwriting:** PolicyFly keeps every policy, email, and data point at your fingertips. This comprehensive control over the policy lifecycle—from quoting to issuance—makes the process not just simpler, but also more profitable.
- **Flexible Program Management:** The platform offers the agility to build and launch new insurance programs within weeks, ensuring insurers remain competitive and responsive.

The spirit of PolicyFly is encapsulated in their tagline: “Fast, Beautiful, Modern.” They offer an all-in-one digital platform with cutting-edge technology that empowers insurers to create efficient and profitable programs.

If you want to see how they’re doing it, you can learn more at their website: [PolicyFly](https://www.policyfly.com).

With Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner and a solid approach to tackling the complexities of insurance, PolicyFly is worth watching as they continue to streamline an often cumbersome industry.
